entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 28.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Local blowing snow. Wind east 20 km/h except gusting to 60 near the Richardson mountains. High minus 28. Wind chill near minus 41. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 29. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow late this evening and overnight. Local blowing snow. Wind light except east 30 km/h gusting to 50 near the Richardson mountains. Temperature steady near minus 29. Wind chill near minus 40. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 24. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Local blowing snow early in the morning. Wind light except east 30 km/h gusting to 50 near the Richardson mountains early in the morning. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022
